item.title: Homelab
item.description: My connected home network (or Homelab) consists of 2 physical servers, a virtual-machine host (Proxmox) and a File server (FreeNAS). Proxmox runs over 25 virtual machines and containers. The Homelab provides various services such as a software firewall, a remote SSH access server, a reverse proxy with Lets Encrypt TLS certificates, a VPN server with certificate authentication, a wiki for internal documentation, a mail server to send external mail, and a home automation system. Some of the software using in my homelab is: FreeNAS, Gitlab, Grafana, InfluxDB, Jekyll, Mediawiki, MySQL, Nginx, OpenHAB, pfSense, Postfix, and Telegraf.
